rules.name: myRule_13
rules.label: Activity Type-Participation in IT, Applications and/or Telecoms Event

rules.label: Activity type-Participation in Nokia Event (i.e. Nokia Partner Conference)

value.stringValue: AND( OR( ISNEW(), ISCHANGED([Co_Op_Activity__c].Activity_Type__c )), ISPICKVAL([Co_Op_Activity__c].Activity_Type__c, 'Participation in IT, Applications and/or Telecoms Event') )

formulas.name: formula_myRule_13

Flow.label: Co-Op Activity type and Proof of performance

value.stringValue: Pay slip of net amount paid to Sales Champion; Copy of approved Nokia Sales Champion contract; Completed monthly sales forecast and results
Itemized invoices showing total cost of event; Copy of presentation/agenda/picture of booth space incl. Nokia logo; If approved as exception, itemized travel and lodging invoices
Itemized invoices showing total cost of event; If approved as exception, itemized travel and lodging invoices
Itemized production invoices; Digital image of promotional merchandise with Nokia logo
Itemized production and publisher invoices; Distribution list and/or Run Report; Sample of PR/press release incl. publication date & Nokia logo
Itemized production and publisher invoices; Sample of magazine/newspaper incl. ad and date; Distribution list and/or Run Report
Itemized 3rd party invoices; Itemized invoices for awards or names of award recipients; Awards won for SPIFFs; Copy of approved incentive rules; Point-of-Sale (POS) Report for Nokia products

Itemized invoices showing total costs of activity; Final copy of invitation and detailed agenda (if applicable); Copy of presentations featuring Nokia; List of attendees (if available); If approved as exception, itemized travel and lodging invoices
Itemized invoices from telemarketing agency incl. detailed costs; Call list of calls placed; Copy of call script
Itemized invoice(s) for training course fees; Copy of the Certificate of Completion OR; Attendee list provided and signed by Nokia instructor

recordUpdates.name: myRule_29_A1
recordUpdates.label: update pop- Web Marketing and Development (Website / Microsite)

value.stringValue: Itemized production and development invoices; URL of developed pages; Copy (text) of web pages developed

Itemized invoices showing total costs; Trade Show details incl. date(s); Trade Show invitation sent by Partner (if applicable); Photo of booth with Nokia logo (if applicable); Number of booth visitors (if captured); Copy of presentation/agenda with Nokia logo (if applicable); If approved as exception, itemized travel and lodging invoices
Itemized production and development invoices; Digital sample of collateral produced incl. Nokia logo or content
Itemized invoices of total costs; Digital sample of direct mail/e-mail/social media campaign/newsletters; Distribution list and/or Run Report
Pay slip of net amount paid to Consultant/Systems Architect; Signed copy of Consultant/Systems Architects contract
